source: The ax is the basic weapon of the Barbarians. All young soldiers are equipped with it.
target: Asciae arma simplicia Barbara sunt. Omnes iuvenes milites eas accipiunt.

source: Flour is produced by the mill out of wheat and is needed in the bakery to produce the tasty Empire bread.
target: E radicis nigrae farina in molis e nigris radicibus facta panis bonus in pistrinis coquitur.

source: It really seems as if we have landed under the only palm trees existing in this far-away sandy desert. I fear we won’t find the help we need to get our ship repaired in good time.
target: Nullae palmae praeter eas, apud quas appuleremus, in hac arensentia esse videntur. Metuo, ne adiuvantes ad naves reficiendas non inveniamus.

source: Documentation, Help and Wiki
target: Documenta, adiutatum, vici

source: Show the help window
target: Monstra adiutorii fenestram

source: That won’t do yet. I still need to connect the lumberjack’s hut to the rest of my road network. After ordering the construction site, I was automatically put into road building mode, so all I have to do is click on the blue flag in front of my headquarters.
target: Non satis est. Casa lignatoris cum aliis viis coniungere debeo. Cum area facta statim aedificandi modus inceperit, solum caeruleum pro principiis insigne crepere possum.

source: Red building symbols can only hold small buildings and flags.
target: Sola parvae casae insigneque super rubas domus imagines aedificari potest.

source: Hide Building Spaces
target: Occulta spatia aedificationem

source: Show Building Spaces
target: Ostende spatia aedificationem

source: Four tribes struggle with their nearest neighbor to be the first to reach the mountain of gold that promises riches beyond belief. But can the two remaining ones share the resources wisely?
target: Quattuor tribus temptant quaque ante finitimum suum  montem multo cum auro obsidere, qui mons divitias ingentes offert. Poteruntne prudenter aliae duae tribus fontes communiter uti?

source: The hunter brings fresh, raw meat to the colonists.
target: Venator carnem bonum ad colonos portat.

source: Smokes meat and fish.
target: Carnem piscemque fumo siccat.

source: The hunter brings fresh, raw meat to the colonists.
target: Venator carnem bonum ad colonos portat.

source: The hunter brings fresh, raw meat to the colonists.
target: Venator carnem bonum ad colonos portat.

source: It is absolutely clear that we need wood to repair our ship. So, I walked through the forest yesterday to look for a nice place for a lumberjack’s house and found one right south of our provisional headquarters.
target: Est apertissimum nos lignum egere, ut naves reficere possumus. Ergo heri per silvas ambulans locum casae lignatoris idoneum inveni. Quae est meridiana principiorum.

source: Defeat Erwyn. He commands the strongest opposing military force left on this island.
target: Vince Erwyn. Militibus fortissimis haec insulae relictis imperavit.

source: The helmet is the basic defense of a warrior. It is produced in an armor smithy. In combination with a wooden spear, it is the equipment to fit out young soldiers. Helmets are also used in training camps – together with food – to train soldiers from health level 0 to level 1.
target: Galea ferramentum elementarium pro militibus protegendo est. In Galearum fabrica facta est et in castris exercendi usa est cum cibo, ut miles ab punctis valetudinis gradus 0 ad puncti valetudinis gradus 1 excolatur.

source: A meal is made out of pitta bread, strong beer and fish/meat in a big inn. This substantial food is exactly what workers in a deeper mine need.
target: Cena in caupone fit e pita, e cervisia bona, e pane vel pisce. Ea ab operarii altissimorum metallorum amatur!

source: The helmet is the basic defense of a warrior. It is produced in an armor smithy. In combination with a wooden spear, it is the equipment to fit out young soldiers. Helmets are also used in training camps – together with food – to train soldiers from health level 0 to level 1.
target: Galea ferramentum elementarium pro militibus protegendo est. In Galearum fabrica facta est et in castris exercendi usa est cum cibo, ut miles ab punctis valetudinis gradus 0 ad puncti valetudinis gradus 1 excolatur.

source: Be sure to send a geologist to survey sites before building a well or a mine.
target: Ante metalla seu fontis aedificium construenda mitte geologum, ut materies quaerat.

source: Be sure to send a geologist to survey sites before building a well or a mine.
target: Ante metalla seu fontis aedificium construenda mitte geologum, ut materies quaerat.

source: And finally, the yellow flag symbol only allows for flags.
target: Et ultimum: Flavum insignis signum solum insignia ibi ponere posse indicit.

source: Getting a Quarry Up
target: De lapidicinarum aedificando

source: Build a quarry next to the rocks
target: Prope saxa lapidicinas aedifica

source: Connect the quarry to the headquarters
target: Lapidicinas cum principiis coniunge

source: You get points for precious wares in your warehouses. The player with the highest number of wares at the end of 4 hours wins the game.
target: Tibi punctas pro res in horreis dantur. Is, qui habet maximum rerum post IV horas, victor erit.

source: This is an endless game without rules. Fog of war is disabled.
target: Hic est infinitus ludus sine regulis et non nimbatus.

source: Four tribes struggle with their nearest neighbor to be the first to reach the mountain of gold that promises riches beyond belief. But can the two remaining ones share the resources wisely?
target: Quattuor tribus temptant quaque ante finitimum suum  montem multo cum auro obsidere, qui mons divitias ingentes offert. Poteruntne prudenter aliae duae tribus fontes communiter uti?

source: Discovers resources for mining.
target: Aquam vel aes ad metalla rimanda invenit.

source: Discovers resources for mining.
target: Aquam vel aes ad metalla rimanda invenit.

source: Discovers resources for mining.
target: Aquam vel aes ad metalla rimanda invenit.

source: There are no rocks near to your starting position. Therefore, you receive extra resources for bootstrapping your economy.
target: Nulla saxa prope locum initiale tuum sunt. Itaque suscipis materias additas oeconomiae tuae.

source: There are no trees near to your starting position. Therefore, you receive extra resources for bootstrapping your economy.
target: Nullae arbores prope locum initiale tuum sunt. Itaque suscipis materias additas oeconomiae tuae.

source: Build medium building
target: Aedificia mediocra facere

source: Click soldier to send away
target: Super militem crepe, ut amittatur

source: Flour is produced by the mill out of wheat and is needed in the bakery to produce the tasty Empire bread.
target: E radicis nigrae farina in molis e nigris radicibus facta panis bonus in pistrinis coquitur.

source: Close the messages window
target: Nuntiorum fenestram claude

source: Close the Messages Window
target: Nuntiorum fenestram claude

source: Bakes bread for workers.
target: Panem laboranti fingit.

source: Bakes bread for workers.
target: Panem laboranti fingit.

source: Big buckets for the fish breeder – produced by the toolsmith.
target: Situlae magnae ad pisces alendos a fabre fabricatur.

source: Flour is produced by the mill out of wheat and is needed in the bakery to produce the tasty Empire bread.
target: E radicis nigrae farina in molis e nigris radicibus facta panis bonus in pistrinis coquitur.

source: Bakes pitta bread for soldiers and miners alike.
target: Panem laboranti fingit.

source: Great! Erwyn gave up when he saw his last buildings burning down. That’s one less strong warlord on this island!
target: Magnifice! Erwyn manus dedit, cum ultimum aedificium igne consumptum videret. Numerus reguli uno minutus!

source: Great! Jomo gave up when he saw his last buildings burning down. That’s one less warlord on this island!
target: Magnifice! Jomo manus dedit, cum ultimum aedificium igne consumptum videret. Numerus reguli uno minutus!

source: We landed on an unknown coast and found peaceful rest under the palm trees growing at the shore. But that is about as good as it gets. The truth is: when I woke up this morning, I saw nothing but sand around us.
target: Ignoto litore navem appulso sub palmis ibi stantibus bene resquiescebamus. Sed hoc est solum bonum. Dicam veritatem: Hodie surgens circa nobis nihl quam saburram vidi.

source: Some of your starting buildings didn’t have enough room and weren’t built. You are at a disadvantage with this; consider restarting this map with a fair starting condition.
target: Quidam aedificationes tuae, non satis spatium habentes, aedificantur non erant. Ergo tu incommodium habes; considera initium novum agere ut aequalia conditiones habere.

source: Flour is produced by the mill out of wheat and is needed in the bakery to produce the tasty Empire bread.
target: E radicis nigrae farina in molis e nigris radicibus facta panis bonus in pistrinis coquitur.

source: It is amazing how far one can see from the highest tower of the castle. We can watch the whole island. So now I wonder why Lanissa did not see us and thus did not prepare. Be that as it may, some things will never come to the light of day. The only important issue at the moment are the opposing troops still left. We have discovered enemy positions held by Erwyn to the north and east of the castle. He is known to be a strong warlord and surely commands the strongest warriors. In the south, we caught sight of some food infrastructures guarded by Jomo – a younger warlord – and we should take care of those infrastructures so we can cut off our enemies’ food supply.
target: Nos longe lateque videre posse mirabile est. Totam insulam pervidere possumus! Miror cur Lanissa nos non videns non praeparaverit. Sed sunt ea quae numquam sciemus. Nunc alios hostiles copias non neglegamus. Erwyn ducis milites et in septentrione et in regione occidentis solis spectante vidimus. Eum notum ducem opibus valentem optimas copias habere puto. In meridie pauca aedificia visa quae sunt Jomo minoris ducis et in quis alimentum facitur. Ea deleamus, ut duces alimentum non habent.

source: This bow is used by the Atlantean hunter. It is produced by the toolsmith.
target: Rete piscarium ab instrumentorum fabro factum a piscatore utitur.

source: That won’t do yet. I still need to connect the lumberjack’s hut to the rest of my road network. After ordering the construction site, I was automatically put into road building mode, so all I have to do is click on the blue flag in front of my headquarters.
target: Non satis est. Casa lignatoris cum aliis viis coniungere debeo. Cum area facta statim aedificandi modus inceperit, solum caeruleum pro principiis insigne crepere possum.
